StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Can you believe it? <sp:5:0:0>There are <clr:0000>Zonai ruins<clr:ffff>
even in the <clr:0000>sky<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>After the Upheaval, several Zonai ruins
suddenly appeared up there.

If I could sprout wings and fly into the
sky, I'd go investigate right away!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>But why is it that we <clr:0000>can't investigate <clr:ffff>the
<clr:0000>floating ring<clr:ffff>? Seems such a shame...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>That was truly scary.<sp:5:0:0> I won't forget that
you saved me!
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Before the Upheaval, <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
was a quiet little town.

But now it's downright famous! People are
calling it<sp:5:0:0> "the home of the Ring Ruins."

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>It's a big change for a tiny little village.
But I'm told the new chief, <clr:0000>Paya<clr:ffff>, is taking
things in stride.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>Y-<sp:5:0:0>you rescued me.<sp:5:0:0> I really thought I was
done for.
Kakariko_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>I take it the spot that's been <clr:0000>circled twice<clr:ffff>
is the <clr:0000>floating ring<clr:ffff>.

What a well-made map!
Kakariko_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, I'm sorry.<sp:5:1:0> Did you want to look at the
<clr:0000>map of the Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?

By all means, go ahead! I'm sorry for
hogging it.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our facilities and our findings are meant
to be freely accessible by the public.

That's been our policy from the start,
when Princess Zelda founded the
Zonai Survey Team.
GoalPoint_01b:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you want to know more about the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>? Then chat with our leader.

He's surely under the <clr:0000>floating ring<clr:ffff>,
staring straight up at it.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Are you...<sp:5:0:0>traveling to see the sights?<sp:5:0:0>


<snd:LaughS_01>I don't blame you. The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> are
really something.

And they really put <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> on
the map. It didn't get nearly as many
visitors before the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>I'm sure the influx of tourists poses a
challenge. But the new chief, <clr:0000>Paya<clr:ffff>,
seems to be taking things in stride.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Do you see the mountain beyond the
lake there? And the <clr:0000>ruins atop it<clr:ffff>?

That's one of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> that fell
from the sky and came crashing down
around <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The village now has visitors who come
to see the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>. But I hear it was
terrifying when they came down.
Though...<sp:5:1:0>maybe it goes without saying
that <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> huge ruins falling from the sky
would be terrifying.
Kakariko_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want to take a look at the <clr:0000>map of
the Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, go ahead! Don't mind me.

Our facilities and our findings are meant
to be freely accessible by the public.

That's been our policy from the start,
when Princess Zelda founded the
Zonai Survey Team.
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Well hello!<sp:5:1:0> Looks like somebody's in
good spirits.
GoalPoint_01_3:
I'm pleased full investigations into the
ruins have resumed...<sp:5:0:0>though I would like
to take part in them directly.
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Good evening!<sp:5:1:0> Looks like somebody's in
good spirits.
Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Whoa! Somebody's pretty chipper for a
gloomy day like this.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>H-<sp:5:0:0>have you come to save me?!<sp:5:0:0> Thank
you so much!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> are the most popular
destination around <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
right now.<sp:0:4:0>I hope they stoke absolutely everyone's
interest in the Zonai.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Several <clr:0000>Zonai ruins<clr:ffff> suddenly appeared
in the <clr:0000>sky<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I'd investigate them right
away—if I could fly!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>N-<sp:5:0:0>no way... <sp:5:0:0>What IS that?<sp:5:1:0> No use fighting<sp:5:0:0>
something like that, is there?!
Near_GoalPoint_01: It's just like on the map!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>Thanks for saving me.<sp:5:0:0> But...<sp:5:0:0>were you
injured? <sp:5:0:0>I hope you're all right.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Wha— <sp:5:1:0>What just happened?<sp:5:1:0>
I...<sp:5:0:0>I can't really remember...
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>This is a token of my gratitude.<sp:5:0:0> Truly,
thank you.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Thanks for saving me.<sp:5:1:0> I'm useless when
it comes to fighting.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Scare>Wah... <sp:5:0:0>Thank goodness.<sp:5:1:0> I was so scared.
My knees are still shaking.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>You're here to...<sp:5:0:0>see the sights, right?<sp:5:0:0>


And let me guess—you want to see the
<clr:0000>chief<clr:ffff> of <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>! I'm right, huh?

<snd:LaughS_01>I hear she's an amazing leader who rebuilt
the village. The folks there love her!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Phew... <sp:5:0:0>Thank goodness.<sp:5:1:0> I'm really glad
you came.
GoRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! But don't let me keep you.


<sp:3:0:2:0100><clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> is right down the road.
Have fun!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Are you...<sp:5:0:0>traveling to see the sights?<sp:5:0:0>
If so, let me give you a tip.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder if rain falls on the <clr:0000>sky ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
One more mystery to solve!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>You're here to...<sp:5:0:0>see the sights, right?<sp:5:0:0>


And let me guess—the sights you want to
see are the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>!
I'm right, aren't I?
<snd:LaughS_01>But then, you don't have to be psychic to
figure that out. After all, <clr:0000>you can't find
ruins like that anywhere else<clr:ffff>.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Do you think that rain...<sp:5:1:0>falls on the
<clr:0000>sky ruins <clr:ffff>too?

There's so much we can't learn if we can't
get up there. <sp:5:0:0>If only I could fly!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive_01>It's a wonder to have ruins from the
age of legends appear here and now
before our very eyes.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> are
particularly important. Everyone should
see them at least once for themselves.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh, interesting! Approaching a member
of the Zonai Survey Team?<sp:5:0:0> Then you must
be curious about the Zonai too.
The Zonai civilization was just a legend...<sp:5:0:0>
but now their ancient ruins are right
before our eyes.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> are
particularly important.<sp:5:0:0> You really should
see them at least once.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You must be traveling to see the sights.<sp:5:0:0>
Going to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, by any chance?<sp:5:0:0>
Or are you returning from there?
The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> around <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
have become a popular destination.
It's only natural to want to see them.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I can heartily say, as a member of the
Zonai Survey Team, that I hope the ruins
stoke everyone's interest in the Zonai!
